app_description.message: This extension shows grade averages hidden by Librus Synergia

options_policy_hint.message: Whether to take grades marked as 'Do not count towards the average' into account for the calculations

options_hide_hint.message: Hides subjects that the user doesn't have any grades for

options_use_weights_hint.message: This allows you to turn off the weights in the calculations

options_default_weight_hint.message: Value used in case the grade has no weight assigned, set to 0 to skip those grades

options_plus_weight_hint.message: The fraction added to a grade with a plus

options_minus_weight_hint.message: The fraction subtracted from a grade with a minus
